description: This table contains imaging related information for Hospital Billing temporary transactions.

columns.name: HTT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the transaction record.

columns.name: IMAGE_MNEMONIC_C_NAME
columns.description:
The image mnemonic given to a specific transaction.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: IMAGE_KEY
columns.description: The image key associated with a transaction.
